value:
When I heard I was in another world,
well... I prepared for the worst.
Truth is, it doesn't seem so different.$k$pAbout the only thing I miss is the
cooking. Ours is better.

No matter where I end up, no matter
who I'm with...it won't change who I
am or what I have to do.$k$pIt doesn't change what matters to me,
either.

One look at you and I can see that
you're exhausted.$k$pIf our tactician is about to keel over...
What does that do for morale?$k$pGo and splash your face with some
cold water. That should do the trick.

I don't care who you are. If you do
anything to hurt Micaiah, you'll
answer to me. Got it?

I was just sharpening my knives.
You've got to be ready for anything,
and you can only rely on yourself.

Don't ask me why they picked me, out
of everybody, but I have a message
from $Nf.

There we go. I'll be able to keep
up the pace.

That's about what I expected. I'll
keep working hard.
That's it? I need to get stronger!

What's this? Guess I learned
something. Hope it's useful.

I'm Sothe. I may not have any special
powers, but I'll do my best. We need
to protect those who matter to us.

Micaiah and I don't really look alike?
Well, of course we don't. We're not
related by blood.$k$pWhen I was a kid, Micaiah took me
by the hand. All she wanted was for
me to not have to cry anymore...$k$pShe held me tight. That's when we
became a family.$k$pOur bond is thicker than blood. No
matter what, we support one another.
We trust each other completely.$k$pWhen I see you fight alongside
Alfonse and the others, never asking
for any kind of reward...$k$pWell, if I squint, it's almost like looking
at Micaiah.$k$pI can't say I really trust you just yet.
Not like I trust her.$k$pThat said, I've come to believe in you.
Why? Because you fight for the
people. I can trust in that.
はっ！
Stop
うああっ！
I messed up...
I've made up my mind.
I have to fight!
I'm fighting for survival!
I'll defeat you!
If I only...had power...
ふっ
I'm Sothe of the Dawn Brigade.
Wha--?! Sometimes, I just don't understand why you do the things you do...
I swore to protect Micaiah. Even if it means fighting Commander Ike...
If you hold strong to your feelings, you will get what you want.
I may not have any special powers, but I've been told I have a fire inside.
I owe Commander Ike my life... I want to be just like him.
Don't leave my side. I'll protect you with all I've got.
Sure.
What are you thinking?
Gotta stay on guard.
